entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
